verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> [Tmiz-MorA Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. of David שְׁמַע־ <S%H8085><s%> she-ma'- Hear אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God קוֹלִ֣י <S%H6963><s%> ko-Li my voice בְשִׂיחִ֑י <S%H7879><s%> ve-si-Chi; in my prayer מִפַּ֥חַד <S%H6343><s%> mip-Pa-chad from fear א֝וֹיֵ֗ב <S%H341><s%> o-Yev, of the enemy תִּצֹּ֥ר <S%H5341><s%> titz-Tzor preserve חַיָּֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yai. my life

תַּ֭סְתִּירֵנִי <S%H5641><s%> Tas-ti-re-ni Hide מִסּ֣וֹד <S%H5475><s%> mis-Sod me from the secret counsel מְרֵעִ֑ים <S%H7489><s%> me-re-'Im; of the wicked מֵ֝רִגְשַׁ֗ת <S%H7285><s%> me-rig-Shat, from the insurrection פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> Po-'a-lei of the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven. of iniquity

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Who שָׁנְנ֣וּ <S%H8150><s%> sha-ne-Nu Who whet כַחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> cha-Che-rev like a sword לְשׁוֹנָ֑ם <S%H3956><s%> le-sho-Nam; their tongue דָּרְכ֥וּ <S%H1869><s%> da-re-Chu [and] bend חִ֝צָּ֗ם <S%H2671><s%> chitz-Tzam, [their bows to shoot] their arrows דָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var words מָֽר׃ <S%H4751><s%> Mar. [even] bitter

לִיר֣וֹת <S%H3384><s%> li-Rot That they may shoot בַּמִּסְתָּרִ֣ים <S%H4565><s%> bam-mis-ta-Rim in secret תָּ֑ם <S%H8535><s%> Tam; at the perfect פִּתְאֹ֥ם <S%H6597><s%> pit-'Om suddenly יֹ֝רֻ֗הוּ <S%H3384><s%> yo-Ru-hu, do they shoot וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יִירָֽאוּ׃ <S%H3372><s%> yi-Ra-'u. at him and fear

יְחַזְּקוּ־ <S%H2388><s%> ye-chaz-ze-ku- They encourage לָ֨מוֹ׀ la-mo דָּ֘בָ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var matter רָ֗ע <S%H7451><s%> Ra', themselves [in] an evil יְֽ֭סַפְּרוּ <S%H5608><s%> Ye-sap-pe-ru they commune לִטְמ֣וֹן <S%H2934><s%> lit-Mon privily מוֹקְשִׁ֑ים <S%H4170><s%> mok-Shim; snares אָ֝מְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Ru, they say מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who יִרְאֶה־ <S%H7200><s%> yir-'eh- Who shall see לָּֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

יַֽחְפְּֽשׂוּ־ <S%H2664><s%> yach-pe-su- They search out עוֹלֹ֗ת <S%H5766><s%> o-Lot, iniquities תַּ֭מְנוּ <S%H8552><s%> Tam-nu they accomplish חֵ֣פֶשׂ <S%H2664><s%> Che-fes a diligent מְחֻפָּ֑שׂ <S%H2665><s%> me-chup-Pas; search וְקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> ve-Ke-rev both the inward אִ֝֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, [thought] of every one וְלֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> ve-Lev [of them] and the heart עָמֹֽק׃ <S%H6013><s%> 'a-Mok. [is] deep

וַיֹּרֵ֗ם <S%H3384><s%> vai-yo-Rem, shall shoot אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him But God חֵ֥ץ <S%H2671><s%> chetz at them [with] an arrow פִּתְא֑וֹם <S%H6597><s%> pit-'om; suddenly הָ֝י֗וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu, become מַכּוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4347><s%> mak-ko-Tam. shall they be wounded

וַיַּכְשִׁיל֣וּהוּ <S%H3782><s%> vai-yach-shi-Lu-hu to fall עָלֵ֣ימוֹ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-mov is against לְשׁוֹנָ֑ם <S%H3956><s%> le-sho-Nam; So they shall make their own tongue יִ֝תְנֹדֲד֗וּ <S%H5074><s%> yit-no-da-Du, them shall flee away כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All רֹ֥אֵה <S%H7200><s%> Ro-'eh upon themselves all that see בָֽם׃ Vam.

וַיִּֽירְא֗וּ <S%H3372><s%> vai-yi-re-'U, shall fear כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אָ֫דָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam And all men וַ֭יַּגִּידוּ <S%H5046><s%> Vai-yag-gi-du and shall declare פֹּ֥עַל <S%H6467><s%> Po-'al the work אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, of God וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֥הוּ <S%H4639><s%> u-ma-'a-Se-hu of his doing הִשְׂכִּֽילוּ׃ <S%H7919><s%> his-Ki-lu. for they shall wisely consider

יִשְׂמַ֬ח <S%H8055><s%> yis-Mach shall be glad צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik The righteous בַּ֭יהוָה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God וְחָ֣סָה <S%H2620><s%> ve-Cha-sah and shall trust ב֑וֹ vo; וְ֝יִתְהַֽלְל֗וּ <S%H1984><s%> ve-yit-hal-Lu, shall glory כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all יִשְׁרֵי־ <S%H3477><s%> yish-rei- in him and all the upright לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> Lev. in heart
